name: Rusl
description:
EXPERIENCE SOMETHING NEW
In Rusl you're playing as a guy named Russel. Your task is to eleminate the last boss.
  • Eleminate bosses in a unique way!
  • Grind through the questline with unique, exciting quests!
  • Obtain rare gear with insane modifiers, be stronger than the monsters!

THE FIGHT SYSTEM
The fighting mechanism in Rusl is unique, and hasn't been seen in any other games. Did you like the old card games back in the 20's? Rusl is for you!

GEAR UP
You can obtain gear pieces in the game, which makes your character stronger by giving you modifiers to your Health, Strenght, and Defense. You can get the
gear by killing monsters, and eleminating bosses after each level.

LEVEL UP
Rusl has an experience system, after every levelup, your character gets primary stat bonuses - in other way - playing more, killing more monsters, makes your
character stronger.

BUILD YOUR HOUSE
In Rusl you can build your house, and customize it in a way you like it. Craft furnitures, paint walls, get stronger doors ... it's all up to your creativity!

UPGRADE YOUR HOME
You can upgrade your house by gathering the required materials for it. Upgrading your house grants you more house inventory space, and you can respawn faster!

GET UNIQUE ITEMS
Killing bosses has never been this good. Why? In Rusl you can get unique items from bosses, granting you unique effects, and bonuses! (Drop chances are random!)

GET PETS
You can get a pet in this game, and customize it however you want. How? You can use the 'Cage' item which is obtainable in-game, and catch a pet in the map.

EXPLORE THE MASSIVE WORLD
Rusl offers a massive playable map with unique elements. Explore it and get rewards!
